feed.title: Rajan Paudel — Software Engineer
feed.subtitle: Portfolio of Rajan Paudel (パウデル ラジャン), experienced Java full-stack software engineer based in Osaka, Japan.

entry.title: Rajan Paudel — Java Full-Stack Software Engineer Portfolio
entry.summary: Experienced full-stack Java software engineer based in Osaka, Japan. Building fintech payment systems, microservices, and enterprise applications with Java, Spring Boot, Angular, and AWS. GitHub: github.com/99702
entry.content:
Rajan Paudel (パウデル ラジャン) is an experienced Java full-stack software engineer based in Osaka, Japan. Specializing in fintech payment systems, microservices architecture, and AWS cloud infrastructure.

Skills: Java, Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, Angular, TypeScript, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, MongoDB, Redis.

GitHub: github.com/99702

entry.title: System Engineer at Kanezen Co Ltd — Osaka, Japan
entry.summary: Building Kanezen's internal business system. Angular frontend, Spring Boot backend, MySQL on RDS, deployed to AWS ECS and Amplify with CI/CD through GitHub Actions.

entry.title: Java Developer at Nepal Clearing House Limited
entry.summary: Multi-tenant banking platform, NPCI integration for India-Nepal cross-border payments, notification system with ActiveMQ, Spring Batch for high-volume transaction processing.

entry.title: Software Engineer at Fonepay — Nepal's Largest Payment Network
entry.summary: Built microservices with Spring Boot and Spring Cloud for Nepal's largest digital payment network. JWT security, Redis real-time data, Docker/KubeSphere deployment.
